description.message: "Hide & Highlight" allows you to hide or highlight any text nodes on web pages for convenient display to other people.

info1.message: Use this extension to blur or highlight specific text on the page. Allow text modification to apply styles.

info2.message: The text of the web page on which this popup is called is modified.

info4.message: For multiple hiding/highlighting, enter search words in the field below, separated by semicolons; for example: apple;sun;tree

info3.message: You can change the colors. After that, you need to close the options page and reopen this pop-up on the desired page.

optionsinfo.message: Select the desired colors, press "Save", close this page and reopen the pop-up (icon of this add-on on the upper right of browser window) on the desired page.

easteregg.message:
Usage tips:
• To search for an exact phrase, enter words with spaces (e.g., apple pie).
• To match a single word or part of a word, just enter that fragment (e.g., app).
• To check multiple words or fragments separately, use semicolons (;) to separate them (e.g., app;pie;berry).
